title: U.S. AG Pam Bondi sold more than $1 million in Trump Media stock the day Trump announced sweeping tariffs
summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi sold between $1 million and $5 million worth of Trump Media shares right before the president announced his “liberation day” reciprocal tariffs on most countries around the world, sending global markets into a tailspin
